nodes.text: An isolation suit was a sealed suit used to protect individuals from airborne diseases or contaminants. Trig and Kale Longo saw a guard wearing such a suit run past their cell onboard the Imperial prison barge Purge. The guard's suit integrity was compromised near the neck and he was bleeding from a wound at the breech. Kale noted this sighting in a letter "to" their deceased father, Von Longo.
